sections.title: External links

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: This requirement pertains to the lead section which is not applicable to the External links section.
Applies to ensure external links are used appropriately to supplement article content.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: The section provides a single relevant external link to the UCSC Gene database consistent with Wikipedia's guidelines for external links.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: The link is suitable as it leads to a recognized database relevant to the gene discussed in the article, fully adhering to common practice.
requirement_evaluations.overlap_notes: No significant overlaps detected in this section.

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: Neutral point of view applicability is limited as this section consists only of an external link.
